- |snippet_verify_license|.
- |snippet_download| |url_git|.
- |snippet_install| |git|.
- |update-installation-instructions| for |git|.
- |snippet_update_license| in
  ``docs/general/license-tables/external/license-info_git.csv``.
- |snippet_changelog_entry|
- |snippet_commit|
  ``Dependency update: <XXXX>/Q<Y>: git <version number>``.
